title: Keep trying
body: 5 accounts permabanned. Keep trying to get rid of me. I'll keep telling trolls to fuck off and assholes to shut the fuck up. If that makes me a toxic shitbag who's just as bad as the other guys then so be it. I'll just keep, uh...levelling...new accounts until this game finally dies :)

replies.body: This is actually pathetic.
Have you considered simply *reporting* the offenders and moving on with your life, rather than allowing yourself to get dragged into counter-productive arguments?
Stop it, you can't use logic... That would defy the point.

I report them all too, but considering the fact that I have absolutely no regard for my account, I flame them too on the offchance that they take it personally and cry a little bit. I know that in 99.9999% of the cases they don't give a fuck, but maybe some kid has actual emotional issues or he's having a bad day and I'm able to get to him.

What's the point of this post?

I'm sure Riot aknowleges that they can't force someone to stop playing considering the accounts are free to create, they just make it so you can't get any worthwhile progression on your account if it keeps getting banned.

And since you're getting banned primarily from an automated system, it's not like Riot is specifically targeting you, it's your own behavior triggering the bans.

I'm just letting those high-horse "I'm-better-than-you-because-I-take-shit-from-trolls-for-no-reason" reporters that overflow these forums know that they can report me all they want, I'm just going to keep coming back.

Why would you want to keep playing a game where obviously no one wants to play with you? You apparently are a very negative person when you play this game so why keep doing that to yourself? Find something you enjoy playing or go outside.

I love playing the game. It's super fun. I hate playing with trolls. If people are allowed to go 0/8/2 in lane and then shit talk our mid for getting solokilled once, then I'm allowed to tell them to go fuck themselves because this is silver and they're feeding way worse than anyone else in the game.

If people are allowed to go 0/8/2 in lane and then shit talk our mid for getting solokilled once, then I'm allowed to tell them to go fuck themselves because this is silver and they're feeding way worse than anyone else in the game.

Ok well whatever floats your boat man. Knowing toxic players have to play 100 games just to get into 1 ranked game with me is fine so keep making new accounts. It takes five seconds to mute and hit the report button at the end of a game. Told some guy this last night who starting spewing racist and homophobic slurs all over the place. You have to waste 100 hours of your time to waste 1 hour of my time, I'm cool with that ratio.
Yeah, levelling these accounts takes forever. I just wish there were some way I could trade something for an account that was already levelled. It's a shame that's not possible, though.

> [{quoted}](name=PersianShinobi,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=wEcQBQHI,comment-id=0003000000000000,timestamp=2016-10-12T21:33:29.139+0000)

Even better. You're literally having to pay to play with me. It's like having to pay fines for being toxic, I think that'd be a great punishment system myself.
https://media.giphy.com/media/9y7nlI4nKiy8o/giphy.gif
tbh... why not just reform? its better to have people not hate your guts.

Reform? So I can let the Orianna in my last game call our Nasus top a "fucktarded shithead" for 40 minutes just because he's really bad at the game? Nah. I'd rather tell Nasus to keep trying his best, and Orianna to go fuck herself.

Alright? Yes, we know nobody can stop you from continuing down this path if you want. We are aware that people with no regard for their money or time will waste both in a pointless fight to stubbornly refuse to be polite in online dealings.

And we are supposed to care why?
Lol have fun bro, gave me a cheeky giggle
Glad to hear that we're both laughing :)
congrats on -19 like lmao, since when have you started playing?
Mid season 3
good for you man.  dont let them try to change your personality.  just be yourself.

Dude, i totally fucking agree, like riot needs to stop fucking giving people who get flammed such a hard fucking time. WE ARE GETTING FLAMMED IN A ALREADY TILTED ENVIRONMENT and they want us to be fucking robots and not reply. They reward flammers, and fuck over the average player, and try to enforce a certain personality to playing league which is "say nothing, take all the hate, then report them" like honestly, i havent seen a single player do this, and i see flammers constantly. If their system worked, we wouldnt have flammers, riot gaming is fucking retarded with this tribunal bullshit

Be careful with that line of thinking. I totally agree with you, but saying shit like that will get you literally crucified here. Luckily for me, I don't care about what oversensitive manbabies on the internet have to say about my gaming habits, so they're free to downvote away.

Don't worry, i got perma-banned recently for just replying to flammers i get, like excuse me? Apperently i have no fucking right to defend myself. I have flammed maybe once in my whole league experience, and i got perma-banned for saying and i literally quote "learn to counter jg" When someone was spouting on and on about how im a "shit player, and i should get cancer and die" I muted them and moved on, and yet, after the game, i still got a fucking perma-ban for this shit. So i feel for you i really do. You have some tenacity with this game, im fucking done with it. Between the shit community and the tribunal doing a shit job at fixing it. It just ruins the game

I feel you 100%. My first 2-3 bans were because I was actually a raging toxic shit flamer, but I stopped doing that a long time ago. I love the game too much to stop playing though; actually, the only reason I even reply to flamers is because I hate seeing them ruin other peoples' games.

Don't get me wrong, I adore this game, from all the crazy team fights, to getting fed and op as fuck and seeing the enemy tilt. In my eyes your a hero. This community needs to realize that to fix toxic players it's about cutting out flammers, not victims.  Flammers are literally in every game i play just about, and you know whats not fixing the problem, reporting and moving on, because 9/10 times, they just make new accounts and stop giving a shit. Theres an ACTUAL toxic player base and its a hell of a lot more than the 0.5% they claim it is, more like 15% and they arn't actually stopping them for fixing anything. If everyone was like you, maybe we could flame away the flammers.
